author: rhuijben
msg: instead of using a near duplicate of the old version of this code from
(SVNClient::getVersionInfo): Use svn_wc_revision_status2() and add a P
to the output for sparse directories.

author: rhuijben
msg: Remove reading information via svn_wc_entry_t from svn_wc_add4(). Use
the wc-db data instead. Also switch to scratch_pool and handle an error
case that can only occur after we move to a single db.
(svn_wc_add4): Remove entry read operation and reduce scope of tmp_entry.

author: hwright
msg: JavaHL: Add support for the patch client API.

author: stsp
msg: * tools/dev/unix-build/Makefile.svn: Build APR with debug flags and without
optimisation (otherwise gdb has trouble stepping through the code).
Fix GNU iconv so that prop_test 22 can pass on OpenBSD.
